name: Hi Crossword-Word Puzzle Game
summary:
Time to exercise your brain in Hi Crossword! 
Simply connect letters to build words, and boost your brain power with 2,000 free puzzles! Remember, the game will start easy and get progressively challenging!
Meanwhile, you can enjoy the beautiful scenery by the sea! 
Download Hi Crossword now and see how many levels you can pass! 
You can also play it with your friends or family to have more fun!
Start your word trip now!

WHY WILL YOU LOVE HI CROSSWORD?
 - Swipe to build words, so easy!
 - Well designed interface, bonza!
 - 2,000 challenging levels, sharpen mind!
- Offline game, play anywhere!

******************************************
If you have any suggestions on Hi Crossword, please do not hesitate to contact us. 
You can either send us message in Hi Crossword, 
or email us at: hicrossword_126_1@histonesupport.com
******************************************
Download and enjoy it now!
